definitions.body: give a blast with clarion or horn (NH id., Hiph.; Thes cp. Ar. raga0 utter a grumbling cry);—Pf. 3 mpl. [[הֵרִיעוּ]] Ju Jdg 15:14, Ezr 3:11, [[הֵרֵעוּ]] 1Sa 17:20, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇרִיעַ]] Is 42:13, Ps 41:12, [[וַיׇּ֫רַע]] Jos 6:20, etc.; Imv. fs. [[הָרִיעִי]] Zec 9:9; mpl. [[הָרִיעוּ]] Jos 6:10 +; Inf. cstr. [[הָרִיעַ]] 2Ch 13:12, 2Ch 13:15; Pt. pl. [[מְרִיעִים]] Ezr 3:13;—

shout a war-cry, or alarm of battle, Jos 6:10, Jos 6:10, Jos 6:10, Jos 6:16, Jos 6:20, Ju Jdg 7:21, 1Sa 17:52, Is 42:13, 2Ch 13:15, 2Ch 13:15; [[הריע]] [[תְּרוּעָה]] Jos 6:5, Jos 6:20; [[לקראת]] Ju Jdg 15:14; [[בַּמִּלְחָמָה]] 1Sa 17:20.
sound a signal for war or march: c. [[חֲחׂחְרוֹת]] Nu 10:7, Nu 10:9 (P); ‖[[תקע שׁוֹפָר ]] Ho 5:8, cf. Jn 2:1; c. [[על]] against 2Ch 13:12; so also prob. Job 30:5 (against a thief).
shout in triumph over enemies: c. [[עַל]], Je 50:15, Ps 41:12; abs. Zep 3:14 (‖[[רנן ]]).
shout in applause: abs. 1Sa 10:24, Zec 9:9, cf. (of angels) Job 38:7.

shout with religious impulse: [[תְּרוּעָה]] ´[[הר]]: 1Sa 4:5, Ezr 3:11, Ezr 3:13; so in public worship with music and sacrifice, c. [[לְ]], to God Ps 47:2, Ps 66:1, Ps 81:2, Ps 95:1, Ps 95:2, Ps 98:4, Ps 100:1, [[לפני]] Ps 98:6; in joy, [[תַּחְתִּיּוֹת אֶרֶץ]] Is 44:23 (‖[[תָנּוּ שָׁמַיִם ]]).

cry out in distress, Is 15:4 (but Du Bu [[יׇֽרְעוּ]] tremble); [[לָמָּה תָרִיעִי רֵָעַ]] Mic 4:9 (of Zion under fig. of woman, but perh. read [[למה תָּרוֹעִי רׂעַ]] why art thou broken all to pieces? as Pr 11:15).

definitions.title: Pō‘lal.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. impers. [[לאׁ יְרׂעָָע]] Is 16:10 a shout shall not be uttered (of joy in harvest; ‖[[יְרֻנׇּן ]]).
shout in triumph: c. [[על]] Ps 60:10 (subj. Phil.; iron.) ‖ Ps 108:10 (subj. ´[[י]]:).
